mapper.insert: insert into `cart_goods`( goods_id, quantity, cart_state, user_user_id, cafe_cafe_id ) values( #{goods_id}, #{quantity}, #{cart_state}, #{user_user_id}, #{cafe_cafe_id} )
mapper.select: select c.cart_id as cart_id, c.goods_id as goods_id, g.goods_name as goods_name, c.quantity as quantity, g.price as price, g.description as description, c.user_user_id as user_user_id, c.cafe_cafe_id as cafe_cafe_id from `cart_goods`c left join `goods`g on c.`goods_id` = g.`goods_id` where c.cafe_cafe_id = #{cafe_id}
